resources.string: This app uses this permission to monitor the activities being carrier out within certain apps
This Notification is used to indicate that the monitoring service is on
Media Wellbeing is currently monitoring the content being displayed on this window
Media Wellbeing is actively Monitoring content
In order to display all scannable media files, the Media Wellbeing App requires permission to access internal storage
Image fetched from your local device images
Failed to load response. Press to retry
By opening this image, you consent to having the image sent to the parent monitor device linked to this application. The parent monitor will be notified and will be able to review this image
MediaWellbeing uses the camera to scan for the QRCode from the parent application
Error initialising camera. Please grant camera permission to app
This image has been reviewed by the guardian and found to be explicit. As such, it can no longer be viewed by you
